EmailTemplate.name: Coupon Budget Request Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Action Required - Coupon Budget Request {!Coupon__c.Marketing_Coupon_Name__c} {!Coupon__c.RecordType} Start Date {!Coupon__c.Coupon_Start_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Coupon__c.Budget_Manager__c}
{!Coupon__c.OwnerFullName} has submitted a new {!Coupon__c.RecordType} Coupon {!Coupon__c.Marketing_Coupon_Name__c} with rundate from {!Coupon__c.Coupon_Start_Date__c} to {!Coupon__c.Coupon_End_Date__c}. The requested Budget amount is {!Coupon__c.eBay_Budget__c} and seller co-funding {!Coupon__c.Seller_Co_funding_share_forecast__c}.
Please screen the coupon request in Hive and set to stage Budget confirmed to ensure the {!Coupon__c.OwnerFullName} can continue with the set up. Link to Coupon record: Coupon Link
Thank you,
Hive
